Articles.Content:
How can I enable the Biome map viewer like scott manly dit here?:

http://youtu.be/fUOlH2qK4oE?t=10s

Edited December 20, 2014 by thomas15v
Press Alt + F12, to activate the Debug Menu. From there, there should be an option to enable biome maps.

There is quite a lot of difference between version 9 and 90. There isn't quite as much between 0.9 and 0.90, but it is significant ^^.

Don't cheat, use SCANSat!

There is quite a lot of difference between version 9 and 90. There isn't quite as much between 0.9 and 0.90, but it is significant ^^.

Don't cheat, use SCANSat!

Is SCANset finally upgraded for 0.90?

Is SCANset finally upgraded for 0.90?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80369-0-25-SCANsat-v8-0-Real-Scanning-Real-Science-at-Warp-Speed%21-Oct-8/page71

Apparently the dev version is, but the main one hasn't been yet.

"Finally"?! 0.90 has only been out a few days! (No idea at all is the answer. I'd better find out before I start launching the things ^^)

If it's not, I'll wait on quite a few other missions until it is.

"Finally"?! 0.90 has only been out a few days! (No idea at all is the answer. I'd better find out before I start launching the things ^^)

If it's not, I'll wait on quite a few other missions until it is.

Well, in fairness the overwhelming majority of mods seem to have updated very rapidly, including the more complicated ones that were somewhat broken by the update (mechjeb, KAC, KER to name a few). Also, see the link I pasted above.

There is quite a lot of difference between version 9 and 90. There isn't quite as much between 0.9 and 0.90, but it is significant ^^.

Don't cheat, use SCANSat!

Oh so thats why that plugin coms handy for . I think I use that .

Using the cheat menu, ehm, ... sounds so cheaty. I thought it was a costum viewer that had to be enabled somewhere.

Oh so thats why that plugin coms handy for . I think I use that ...

SCANSat's great. As the satellites map the surface of each body they also reveal 'anomalies' - any odd "Easter Eggs" that the developers have put into the game. They make interesting/amusing/amazing places to visit, in order to find out what they are!
